meanings.sent1: The flowers outspringing from the ground were a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent2: The rabbit outspringing from its burrow startled me.
meanings.sent3: The jack-in-the-box outspringing always makes me jump!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter outspringing filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The rocket outspringing into the sky left a trail of light behind.

meanings.definition: The act of springing out or forth
meanings.sent1: The sudden outspringing of the cat caught the mouse off guard.
meanings.sent2: The outspringing of new leaves signaled the arrival of spring.
meanings.sent3: The outspringing of ideas during the brainstorming session was impressive.
meanings.sent4: The outspringing of emotions overwhelmed her during the heartfelt speech.
meanings.sent5: The outspringing of water from the fountain created a refreshing mist in the air.
